title: San Francisco's Killer Police Robots Threaten the City's Most Vulnerable
description: Law enforcement says that in some scenarios a lethal robot is the only way to protect public safety. Experts say the policy will harm communities of color.

title: Electric Vehicles Cut US Gas Consumption by a Measly 0.54%
description: A new report shows that national gasoline usage barely changed in 2021, despite increasing EV adoption.

title: How to Make the Most of In-Person Conferences
description: Now that live events are starting up again, here are some tips on how to get back out there, while staying safe and sane.

title: Apple Won’t Let Staff Work Remotely to Escape Texas Abortion Limits
description: In "listening sessions," Texas managers said employees fearful of the state’s abortion restrictions couldn't work from home or transfer to another office.
